Posts.Content: Jan 19, 2019 07:23PM Jacy wrote: I had 2 US biopsies and yesterday had a steriotactic. The radiologist told me small calcifications don’t show on US. It was the same as described by SDWoman in above post. For me it was not quite as easy as the US biopsy but that was only because of the position. It’s very tolerable. You’ll do great.
Posts.Title: Sterotactic biopsy not thru ultrasound. Coal1017 SDWoman
